title: So I just watched Mind of the Virtuoso
body:
And by the end of it while I was captivated, I was struck by the a thought that it also looked like a commercial for some cosmetic product, with Jihn being the salesman.
I've been having bouts of giggles for about 20 minutes now.

replies.body:
Coming This Fall:
*whispery voice* Odeur d' Jhinger

... Odeur d' Ginger?

What are you hiding in your basement?

> [{quoted}](name=Decrit,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hesEUEQd,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-07T08:37:49.754+0000)
>
> ... Odeur d' Ginger?
> 
> What are you hiding in your basement?

Ha! What is hiding under his *hat*!?!

I don't know where I remember reading it, but someone said it looks like this character is walking forwards, not backwards, despite us seeing a face (and hand).  If this is a champion from Zaun, its plausible that he could be some type of Chimera.  An experiment that has merged multiple beings/things/personalities.  This could explain the teasers for Zed/Sona/Vi/Garen, who all have character flaws that could be fixed.  Subsequently a video which never shows bullets, but a gun that seems to fire energy, creating (failing to create) living organisms attached to an existing host.  Something akin to Shou Tucker, the Sewing-Life Alchemist from Full Metal Alchemist.

A long shot I'm sure, but it would bring something new.

Hmm, that's quite an interesting theory. 
When I saw it, the first thing that came to mind was a really artsy guy who likes to create beauty in death, or at least warp what he deems to be unsightly to meet his aesthetic.   
Overall though, the video has me way more psyched than any other champion teaser.
If the Deadeye/Jhin turns out to be some crazed gunman who has a thing for art, I guess you can say this is a cosmetic ad for artists.
People really get that into this stuff?
You watched it and have no idea what it's about or why it's there? omg me too...
